thread.title: practical and easygoing
thread.title_full: practical and easygoing - Review of Hotel Beauchamps, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: mooseman69
title: practical and easygoing
text:
this is straight to the point hotel in a good location.
the room is very comfortable although not very big.
helpful and friendly staff. enjoyed my quick stay.
you can enjoy a typical french breakfast in the morning before cursing around on the Champs Elys√©es. It is also a walking distance from the Georges V and the Athenee.
